name: The Triumph of the Cross
description: The Triumph of the Cross; Eugenio Cajés (Caxés) (Spanish, 1574 - 1634); about 1613 - 1634; Brush drawing in brown wash over red and black chalk; 23.3 x 22.2 cm (9 3/16 x 8 3/4 in.); 94.GA.81; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Triumph of the Cross
medium: Brush drawing in brown wash over red and black chalk
